RobPlayerInfo - Class in client.data
Used to pass player information into the rob view

PROPERTIES:
Id: Unique player ID PlayerIndex: Player's order in the game [0-3] Name: Player's name (non-empty string) Color: Player's color (cannot be null) NumCards: Number of development cards the player has is greater than or equal to zero
